movie.title: The Body Beneath
movie.description_intro: One rainy day in London on the edge of Hamstead Heath, there's a knock at the front door of the Ford family home. Unknown to any of the Ford household, the Reverend Alexander Algernon Ford, is actually the head of a large family of ancient vampires also named Ford, who are on the hunt for fresh blood because of constant intermarriage between the vampires over the centuries has seriously diluted their blood line. The vampire "reverend" has his eyes set on a particular relative, Susan Ford, whom he plans to kidnap. He intends to indoctrinate her into his secret coven and use her as a breeder in order to stay in existence. How will Susan be saved?
movie.description_full: One rainy day in London on the edge of Hamstead Heath, there's a knock at the front door of the Ford family home. Unknown to any of the Ford household, the Reverend Alexander Algernon Ford, is actually the head of a large family of ancient vampires also named Ford, who are on the hunt for fresh blood because of constant intermarriage between the vampires over the centuries has seriously diluted their blood line. The vampire "reverend" has his eyes set on a particular relative, Susan Ford, whom he plans to kidnap. He intends to indoctrinate her into his secret coven and use her as a breeder in order to stay in existence. How will Susan be saved?

movies.title: The Brotherhood of Satan
movies.summary: A family is trapped in a desert town by a cult of senior-citizens who recruit the town's children to worship Satan.
movies.description_full: A family is trapped in a desert town by a cult of senior-citizens who recruit the town's children to worship Satan.
movies.synopsis: A family is trapped in a desert town by a cult of senior-citizens who recruit the town's children to worship Satan.

movies.title: Dr. Giggles
movies.summary: The psychopathic son of a mass-murdering doctor, escapes from his mental institution to seek revenge on the town where his father was caught. The giggling doctor kills his victims with a surgical theme. His goal being to give one of the townfolk a heart transplant.
movies.description_full: The psychopathic son of a mass-murdering doctor, escapes from his mental institution to seek revenge on the town where his father was caught. The giggling doctor kills his victims with a surgical theme. His goal being to give one of the townfolk a heart transplant.

movies.title: Piranha
movies.summary: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.
movies.description_full: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.
movies.synopsis: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

movies.title: The Testament of Dr. Mabuse
movies.summary: Berlin police inspector Lohmann investigates a case, in which all clues lead to a man, who's in a hospital for mental illnesses for since many years - Dr. Mabuse.
movies.description_full: Berlin police inspector Lohmann investigates a case, in which all clues lead to a man, who's in a hospital for mental illnesses for since many years - Dr. Mabuse.
